content:
You’re at the halfway point! Resist the temptation to ‘eat for two’. During labor, your weight will make things easier for you if controlled. Ensure that you stick to sound eating habits, employing a diet rich in proteins, calcium, and vitamins. It should also contain fresh and dried fruits, veggies, and both white and red meat, which are perfect for the baby. Yogurt and dried plums help keep constipation at bay. 

Avoid sweets, buns, chocolate, coffee, and carbonated drinks.

As always, stay properly hydrated.
